description: Octopus can be tricky to get right but this marinade and griddle method will deliver great results. Ask your fishmonger to prepare the octopus for you.
name: Grilled Octopus Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5kg whole octopus, cleaned and sliced by your fishmonger

recipeInstructions.text: Place the octopus in a large pan of water with the onion, carrot, celery and peppercorns. Bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer for 1.5 hours. Drain well and leave to cool slightly.
Chop the octopus into pieces and place in a bowl. Add the olive oil, vinegar, garlic, chilli and oregano, cover and leave to marinade for 2 hours.
Heat a griddle pan on the highest heat and working in batches, sear each piece for 2 minutes on each side. Serve with lemon wedges.
